channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump nominates White House aide to be top US prosecutor for office probing Letitia James
item.description: President Donald Trump said Saturday that he would be nominating senior White House aide Lindsey Halligan to serve as the top federal prosecutor for the Virginia office that was thrown into turmoil when its U.S. attorney was pushed out Friday.
item.content:encoded:
President Donald Trump said Saturday that he would be nominating senior White House aide Lindsey Halligan to serve as the top federal prosecutor for the Virginia office that was thrown into turmoil when its U.S. attorney was pushed out Friday.

(Image credit: Jacquelyn Martin)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: UK set to recognize Palestinian state despite opposition from the US
item.description: The U.K. is expected to recognize a Palestinian state later Sunday despite opposition from the U.S., after judging that Israel has not met conditions it set over the war in Gaza.
item.content:encoded:
The U.K. is expected to recognize a Palestinian state later Sunday despite opposition from the U.S., after judging that Israel has not met conditions it set over the war in Gaza.

(Image credit: Leon Neal)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: MAGA movement will bid farewell to Charlie Kirk with a hometown funeral in Arizona
item.description: Kirk's funeral is expected to bring tens of thousands of his supporters to a stadium in Glendale, Ariz. President Trump will deliver remarks, as will several top White House officials.
item.content:encoded:
Kirk's funeral is expected to bring tens of thousands of his supporters to a stadium in Glendale, Ariz. President Trump will deliver remarks, as will several top White House officials.

(Image credit: Phill Magakoe)
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: Man is arrested and charged in New Hampshire country club shooting
item.description: A gunman opened fire in a New Hampshire country club on Saturday, killing one person and wounding several others, authorities said.
item.content:encoded:
A gunman opened fire in a New Hampshire country club on Saturday, killing one person and wounding several others, authorities said.

(Image credit: Michael Casey)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Tropical Storm Gabrielle expected to become 2nd Atlantic hurricane of the season
item.description: Gabrielle is forecast to pass east of Bermuda, the U.S. mainland, and could rise to the strength of a Category 2 hurricane.
item.content:encoded:
Gabrielle is forecast to pass east of Bermuda, the U.S. mainland, and could rise to the strength of a Category 2 hurricane.

(Image credit: National Hurricane Center)
item.dc:creator: Ava Pukatch

item.title: Man arrested after drive-by shooting at ABC TV station in Sacramento
item.description: At least three bullets were fired into the station, according to the Sacramento Police Department. Authorities are investigating a possible motive.
item.content:encoded:
At least three bullets were fired into the station, according to the Sacramento Police Department. Authorities are investigating a possible motive.

(Image credit: Screenshot)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: California bans masks meant to hide law enforcement officers' identities
item.description: The law, opposed by police organizations, was aimed by lawmakers at immigration agents and will test state powers over the conduct of federal officials.
item.content:encoded:
The law, opposed by police organizations, was aimed by lawmakers at immigration agents and will test state powers over the conduct of federal officials.

(Image credit: Gregory Bull)
item.dc:creator: Gerardo Zavala

item.title: Trump's new $100K fee on H-1B visas will hurt the tech companies trying to woo him
item.description: More than half a million high-skilled U.S. workers are in the country through the H-1B program, which is heavily used by the big tech companies trying to curry favor with the president.
item.content:encoded:
More than half a million high-skilled U.S. workers are in the country through the H-1B program, which is heavily used by the big tech companies trying to curry favor with the president.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: Maria Aspan

item.title: Taylor Swift upcoming 'The Life of a Showgirl' to hit movie theatres
item.description: The global music icon is celebrating the release of her 12th studio album in theaters next month. Her Eras Tour movie, released with AMC in 2023, is the highest-grossing concert film of all time.
item.content:encoded:
The global music icon is celebrating the release of her 12th studio album in theaters next month. Her Eras Tour movie, released with AMC in 2023, is the highest-grossing concert film of all time.

(Image credit: Evan Agostini)
item.dc:creator: Ava Pukatch

item.title: Top Democrats ask for a meeting with Trump ahead of government shutdown
item.description: In new letter to President Trump, Democratic congressional leaders Chuck Schumer and Hakeem Jeffries request a meeting to discuss the path forward for government funding ahead of a Sept. 30 deadline.
item.content:encoded:
In new letter to President Trump, Democratic congressional leaders Chuck Schumer and Hakeem Jeffries request a meeting to discuss the path forward for government funding ahead of a Sept. 30 deadline.

(Image credit: Demetrius Freeman)
item.dc:creator: Barbara Sprunt
